name: Phpcms
tagline: This a CMS in PHP with an example of TODO app with authentication and admin section
body:
### Welcome to PHP CMS
It is a low weight CMS.

### Features
* Built-in authentication system
* Well structured and moodular
* custom theme option
* Pretty routing just like MVC framework
 
### Why to use this CMS
* For learning purpose
* For creating quick website

### LICENSE
This this open source project with MIT LICENSE. You are allow to use it without any restriction.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [Website](https://www.findalltogether.com)

### Tutorials
For learning purpose, tutorials are being published on [Find All Together](http://www.findalltogether.com). Tutorials for this version are coming soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
